message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I believe my initial offer of $1,350,000 is more reflective of its true worth. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000.  Would you be open to that?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,300,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
